title: Advanced Science Topics for Teachers
description: Science topics for credentialed and pre-service teachers. Content, hands-on activities geared towards California science standards. Development of inquiry-based lessons and skills for integration of language, literacy and technology into the science curriculum. The Schedule of Classes will list topic selected. Total credit limited to 12 units; repeatable same term. 1-4 seminars.
prerequisites: Multiple Subject or Single Subject teaching credential or consent of instructor
